dialogueLines.line: (yawn) I slept well!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: But it doesn't look like there are any here in town either.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...A memory clue of mine.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Her name is Lily Engrave.
She is an amnesiac zombie who cannot remember anything about her identity except for that name.
She usually eats humans and goes to every town looking for clues to her memory.
(grooowwwlll...)
...Ugh...I woke up and I'm hungry.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Ah but what should I do ah, it's hard to find something because people don't go this way around here.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Oh I'm so hungry I'm going to die...I'm already dead.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: *swish*
Whoa!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ! Did the wind blow the flyer...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...Eh! What!? What is this!? Seriously!?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: [Why don't you show off your rap skills? Please come to "Carmen Dare," a once-in-a-lifetime rap battle competition. If you win with flying colors, you will get the right to make one wish come true. The competition will be held today at the following address. Don't miss it!]
Rap battle competition...the right to make one wish come true...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: hehehe...I never thought I'd find a clue to get my memory back in a place like this...!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: A rap battle competition...? I mean, if I go to that venue...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: That means there will be tons of "humans" there for me to eat, right!?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: So the plan is that if we eat enough of those humans, we'll be full of energy and then we can set off again on our journey to the next town to search for memories!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Wahahaha! You're good! My brain! It's not just hanging on my head!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Alright! Well, then, the "Zombie Lily's All-You-Can-Eat Human Tour" is about to begin!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: ...And so the zombie girl heads off to the rap battle venue to eat humans.
